EmailTemplate.name: Service Plan Review Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Service Plan Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is an automatically generated message from our ESD system.
Hello {!Plan__c.LastModifiedBy},
{!Plan__c.PBS_Template_Name__c}'s (Billing ID: {!Plan__c.PBS_Template_Billing_Id__c}) current plan is due for a review.
Thank you.
